#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int i,x,n,j,k,l,p;
	cin>>x;
	p=1;
	if(x!=0)
	while(x!=0)
	{
		long long int arr[x],sum=0,k=0;
		for(i=0;i<x;i++)
		{
		cin>>arr[i];
		sum+=arr[i];
		}
		sum/=x;
		for(i=0;i<x;i++)
		{
		k+=abs(sum-arr[i]);
		}
		cout<<"Set #"<<p<<endl;
		cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<k/2<<"."<<endl;
		cin>>x;
		p++;
	}
}
